text: Bruille-lez-Marchiennes is a commune in Nord in north France. In 2019, 1,361 people lived there. Bruille-lez-Marchiennes is a village in the Ostrevent region of the Nord-Pas-de-Calais mining basin, bordering Somain to the west. As the crow flies, it lies 12 km east of Douai, 33 km south of Lille or the Franco-Belgian border, 29 km from Tournai, 20 km west of Valenciennes and 21 km north of Cambrai. The commune is located in the Lille catchment area, in the Valenciennes urban unit, in the Douai employment zone and in the Somain catchment area. == References == == Other websites == * INSEE commune file Category:Communes in Nord
title: Bruille-lez-Marchiennes
